entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:44 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -25.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clyde River Airport 6:42 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -25.8°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -29.3°C
Wind: NW 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening. Blizzard developing after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 after midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:03 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending late in the morning then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 20 late in the morning. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:03 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Blowing snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:03 PM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
